Mr* Harry Skornia
NAEB
Regional Meeting
Kellogg Center
Michigan State University
East Lansing, Michigan
Dear Harry:
Just a note to say I’m sorry I won’t be able to
be with you for the meetings. Best regards from
all of us here to those who can make it. I do
hope you’ll drop by to see us next time you’re
through Chicago.
Sincerely
UA few
Chalmers Marquis f\
